explains: v. 醒来，唤醒；唤起（记忆）（wake 的现在分词）
wordGroup: waking up 醒来；唤醒（wake up的ing形式）

sentences.en: We spoke quietly for fear of waking the guards.
sentences.cn: 我们悄悄说话，以免惊醒警卫。

sentences.en: I can't get out of the habit of waking at six in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我早上六点钟醒的习惯改不了。

sentences.en: Imagine waking up and finding the value of your assets has been halved.
sentences.cn: 想象一下，你一觉醒来发现自己资产的价值缩水了一半。
